content:
/>
XIII.ii.3.B.1.c
.
Information to Furnish HHS or Other Department or Agency of the U.S. Government
Furnish information as provided in
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, 3.B.1.b
upon receipt of a request from the U.S. Public Health Service (USPHS), Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), or any other department or agency of the U.S. Government.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B - Requests from Public Assistance Agencies
citation: Part XIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
